content.detailedDescription: The event happend like this. i was sleepy so i went to bed. about one hour later my father told my mother to come and get me because theres something in the sky. so i thanking like this was one of my fathers usual jokes hesitated but i got  up and went out and said to my father this i hope this is not a joke. and it wasent it was exactly as my mother had told me. so me and my father and mother looked at it for about 20 minutes and durning that period my mother had called her sister to ask them if they had saw it so my mothers sister looked also along with her daughter and they had also saw it and they where in the next town. the object stayed in one area never moving except going around in circles. durning the sighting we where in awe thanking what is this because this has never appeared in a town like mine. it was an great sight to look upon. something that is unexplainble to me, so i wanted to report this being that is is something to remember and ponder upon. the object disappeared right before us into a clear sky with some clounds. i looked for signs of spot lights, marketing lights but there was none. the object just disappeared like the blink of an eye. never to reappear that night.
content.summary: Ufo was disc  filled with light.

content.detailedDescription: We were stationed in long beach,ca during the years 71-74. while traveling down the highway a slow moving disc is spotted by my mother. it had a metallic grey color with a roll of windows going all the way around the craft. it resembled the famous barny & betty hill craft. in fact, as the craft passed over the highway beings could be spotted through the windows. they were standing and appeared to be looking out the shaded windows. it was very low to the highway and then moving right to left exited the veiwing area. what is most fascinating about this incident is that it was seen by multiple witnesses and the people or beings could be seen looking out the windows which wrapped all the way around the craft. they appeared to have had larger than normal heads, or were wearing some kind of gear.If someone would like further details feel free to contact us.
content.summary: Slow moving disc shaped craft passes over highway during daylight hours. it resembles the barney & betty hill craft with similar windows and entities.

content.detailedDescription:
At 16:10 on monday the 7th of april 2008 i left paris charles de gaul airport bound for tunis. my flight number was af 2384. (air france) the aircraft was an airbus a320 and was travelling at an approximate altitude of 35,000 feet. between 17:00 hours and 17:30 hours i was looking out of the window on the left side. i noticed in the distance above the cloud cover and slightly higher than the flight a large oblong shape in the distance. it had a greyish coppery colour. i watched the object for some time thinking to my self 'could this be my first ufo sighting?' the object was sitting still in the sky. it looked solid. not clouds or anything explainable. as i was watching it i noticed to the right coming through the cloud base a small dark shape that looked like a fighter jet travelling in the opposite direction from my flight. it was small but i could just about make out the shape of the tail and nose. behind the jet was it's slipstream, dark in colour. i watched the jet fly up over the cloud cover heading towards the object i was watching. the jet then turned right and then ascended getting closer to the object. then i saw the jet do a zig zag motion towards the object. (i'd estimate the object as being at least 20 times bigger than the jet.) i could tell the zig zag motion by watching it's slip stream. as it got closer i noticed the object (ufo) get small very quickly then it disappeared moving away from my flight and the jet. 

about 15 minutes later i saw the fighter jet descend back down through the clouds. obviously going back to base. 

i'm not sure exactly what country we were flying over at the time but i think it was southern france 

i am sure this was a ufo. i can't explain what else it would be. and i don't think a fighter jet would be chasing nothing. if there were any other passengers onboard who saw this too i don't know. 

but i am confident in saying this was my first ufo sighting. and i hope to see more....... 

a bit unfortunate i didn't have my camera with me!!
content.summary: Saw a ufo getting chased by a fighter jet!

content.detailedDescription:
H���ran about 5 red lights and did not deliver sound were surrounded by some sort of fog that i could see it after staying for a long time on my computer and look out the window when i noticed an object flying very low with no sound and a very mild at that time take a picture but the resolution is not very good, then stopped in front of a hill and began to climb to the top and then disappeared slowly behind, but after a few blue lights and red were formed around the hill. 
it was a very big inaccuracies as they had not seen anything like imprecionante and was already the size that i had as a school bus.
content.summary: Héran about 5 red lights seemed to be a single ship.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the velasco fielf of a friend, in the top of the mountain house, with my camera sony trv-310 and i want tu recored a real ufo. it was not my first, and appear a disk what you can see in the video that i recorded. fithteen minutes later i recorded anotherone. plesase see the images. i know that they are extraterrestrial, last 2008 in the last 3 moths i recorded 7 times real ufo, you can see all my films in youtube channel mel3d.
regards from argetina.
content.summary: Ufo la rioja argentina - cerro velasco 21-12-2008.

content.detailedDescription: Time is roughly 8:50pm.  location, so burlington, vermont.  i was on i-89 north between the south burlington and first winooski exit.  out of the top corner of my eye i picked up a dark yellowish round source of light moving in an extremely fast trajectory towards the ground.  there is very little light on the highway so you can see the sky quite clearly against the dark background.  i was heading north, having just passed the airport within 2 miles to my right.  at first my instinct said plane crashing into the ground with great speed but for the life of me i could not see any explosion or impact.  i was literally leaning over my steering wheel eyes wide open waiting for a huge explosion.  next thought was shooting start but this wasn't a line of light, it was a distinct ball or deep yellow that moved rapidly into the horizon from a 45*ish angle from the top right of my view to the bottom center and then gone.  i was so thrown by this that i pulled off after the exit and looked up into the sky for a minute, but had trouble seeing because of the streetlights.  a mile from this spot moving east was about a dozen police cars pulled off the road into a field with all lights off.  they were from various local towns, and i could not see anyone walking around.  this is a very clear area with little light so it is a good location to see the skies around you.  i honestly couldn't understand what so many police were doing this late at night at such an awkward location having driven up off the asphalt onto the grass of the field to make room for all the squad cars.  the other thing that really confused me was that there wasn't a single light on any of the cars, nor on inside the cars.  i drive this route home almost every night at the same time and have never seen any cars off the side of the road in this fashion.  there is a military base roughly 1 mile from where the squad cars were piled together if it is of any added connection.  as i passed this base another essex police car came by me with flashing blue lights on the opposite side of the road, seeming to slow and turn off lights in the vacinity of the other police cars.  i have never reported anything like this before in my life, but have never felt so bewildered by an event such as what i witnessed tonight.  i hope my documentation is of use to anyone else in the area that shared an experience tonight.
content.summary: Distinct circle of yellow light moving fast towards ground like crashing plane - followed by strange police presence.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo that i see have mutch color and stay stoped in the skay i talk with my friend and when i saw de sky one fing whith boomerang shape was stoped . 10 minutes after this fings flew fast and disapeared. i dont belive what hapened but other day in november i saw this ufo again it was stoped in the sky again and after 10 or 9 minutes fly fast again i stay mutch scared. in the first time my friend dont see the ufo because he was in the window of jis house and i was in the street and the ufo apered in the skay behind his house.
content.summary: It have much color and fly much fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down fremont blvd., heading toward irvington district from automall parkway. i had just turned onto fremont blvd. when i noticed something shiny with red on it low in the sky off to my left. at first i thought it was a low-flying helicopter coming towards automall, until i realized that it wasn't shaped like a helicopter. also, it seemed to be too low for a helicopter since the freeway was a bit further off to the right (east) than the location of this object. then i thought it might be a really big remote-control toy. as i paid closer attention, i noticed that the object was actually flat-shaped. more like an upside-down shiny metal plate. and it was really shiny. the sun was glaring off of it. as i watched, it curved further to the left, towards me, over the neighborhood, and then it started to go away from my location, heading north/northwest. before i could determine anything, it had shot away and was not even discernible in the sky. it went from flying away to being far away in just a few seconds. 

it was hard to keep track of it, as i was also trying to drive down fremont blvd. i couldn't spot it in the sky at all once it took off, though a few seconds later i saw a commercial airplane go over from the east, heading west/northwest, as i was scouring the sky. the airplane looked nothing like what i had seen, other than it also had some red on it. and it was flying in the sky. other than that, it was very different from the object i had seen only moments before. i still don't know quite what to make of it! it wasn't until a few seconds after it had disappeared that i felt any real reaction to what i'd seen. my mind kept trying to make sense of this very odd object in the sky. it flew low, though, so as it went away, tree tops and closer buildings obstructed any further view i might have had.
content.summary: Shiny flat disc shaped object flying low over neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription:
The nightsky was extremely clear and filled with stars.  around 8:00 pm i was just standing outside my daughter's farmhouse which is about 3 miles from the west coast of lake huron and staring up at the nightsky when i observed a large round star-like object travelling almost directly overhead parrellel to the earth going in a south to northern path.  

the object appeared slightly bigger than any of the other largest visible stars/planets and travelled in a slow steady manner.  it was not as high up or as small as any satellite of which i am very familiar with.  it did not appear to be up as high as a commerical jet or as low as a small local private plane. 

it did not have the manner of a falling star or meteor insofar that it did not just seem to fall or drop down on an angle and burn out.

the colouring appeared as just a very bright, white (not glowing) light.  

it did not appear to be any sort of aircraft of which i am familiar seeing in this area.  i observed it for about 15-20 seconds before running into the house to tell my daughter who was able to grab a quick glimpse of a white star-like object through the window before it disappeared.

it did not make any sound.  the evening was quiet and i observed this object on a farm where i am always seeing jets and other types of aircraft and am able to hear them.  

this was definitely something i have never seen before and i knew immediately upon seeing it that it was something quite different from any other aerial objects i have seen.  i became excited right away and just had to make sure someone else saw this object.  unfortunately it had disappeared by the time i ran back outside again.

one speculation i had after the incident was that this was some sort of craft (ufo) which was reflecting light from the sun which had already gone down some hour before.  although the description of this object is relatively plain and unexciting i instinctively knew i was seeing something unusual.
content.summary: Bright round starlike object.

content.detailedDescription:
I know this event happened awhile ago but i have had these pictures and the sighting in my mind for a very long time now and i am dying for some one to review this. 

i was at a friend of mine's house around three o'clock in the morning hanging out in his drive way in apple valley california. we were talking about random things as we normally do that time of the morning when my friend went over behind his truck for a moment to urinate. when he came back he told me that he noticed a "star" moving in the distance we all converged at his truck and started to watch the object. sure enough we all saw the image moving back and forth very rapidly and abruptly. once we all agreed the object was moving he went inside and got his moms digital camera to photograph the object. we took multiple pictures from different angles and reference points like trees and other stars in the sky to try and validate the sighting. i even took a picture of the brightest star in the sky( other than the object in question ) and tried jerking the camera to mimic what we were seeing in the pictures... it barely appeared visible on the screen. the opject stayed in sight for about an hour moving bacj and forth in the sky as we talked in amazement for awhile and eventually got tired and all went our seperate ways. since that day i have had the pictures dying to get a second opinion on what they were...
content.summary: I need answers for the pictures i have.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work 3/19/09. at 6:20 am i looked north from co rd 400w where i was traveling west. i saw a pattern of lights blinking in a triangle shape, accenting the corners. it looked as if it was blinking 10 times at each point for 3 seconds. the light moved in a clock wise blink pattern following the corners. the object looked stationary in a hover. i knew it was nothing i had ever seen before. the distance was what i precieved to be over lake michigan to the north at least 10 miles from where i was. my guess on altitude was in the 5,000-10,000' range. i grabbed my camrea phone immediately and started to get the camera started 1.3 mega pixel, it's a t mobile phone. i opened the moon roof on my suv and started taking pics and saving them as fast as i could... i could not get the lights strobing on 3 attempts. the 4th attempt i was successful in capturing the object, as it light brightly white and speed upward at an angle. i was 100' short of the intersection of 400w and cleveland road in michigan city, in. (see attached picture).
content.summary: Hovering strobing triangle for around 1 min then left at amazing speed.

content.detailedDescription: 1st sighing - wednesday night, march 18th apprx 7pm 2009 my family and i were enjoying a bbq/fish fry in my father-in-law's backyard. i noticed the fighter jet engine noise and looked to the sky. the first thing i noticed was 4 fighters with standard strobes flying in combat formation (lead plane forward, wingman to the right and slightly behind) there were two sets of two fighters trailing an enormous craft clustered of dozens of amber lights/orbs. they were all traveling north to south at a consisant pace at first sight, then changed direction at about 280 degrees south to head north-west. traveling north-west, the craft and jets flew directly over our heads. 10 people were in the group, 7 people witnessed the event including myself. as the craft came dead straight above our heads, we could see clearly that it was a huge vehicle. at that time, it appeared to have a main body of amber lights and a "hull" and one wing outstretched to about 300+feet. what was odd, was that we could all make out the triagle/boomerage shape because of the stars being blocked out as it passed them and by the small, very faint reddish glow or light at the tip of the "wing". the fighters jets kept pace and followed, maintaining the same distance througout. 2nd sighting - 30 minutes after the first sighting, the craft flew over again, this time the fighters were scrabbled and not in any noticable formation. the object itself was silent. that time, only my wife and i witnessed it while we were leaving to drive home. this was so impressive and the second pass inspired me to get home and get the video camera. when we arrived at our house a few minutes later, i could see it circling back around and coming our direction. i grabbed my binolulars and my wife and i faced south to watch it come back overhead. 3rd sighting - this time, with my binos, i saw the object perfectly. as i write this, my adrenalin surges a little and i get chills. at 10,000+ feet, this dark craft barely fit into view through the eye peices. i have 30 power binoculars to give some perspective. it definately blocked out the background stars and was boomerang shaped. its amber lights at the center of the body were the strangest part. i could not tell if they were on the outide of the craft or if that part of the craft was transparent. they seemed to be clustered in an oval shape but some were slightly larger than others indicating that i could see the closest ones and the furthest ones simultaneously. i could confirm that the wing tips had very miniscule lights on each end as well. this thrid pass, the fighters were trailing behind again. i got a sense of scale by that fact and was in awe. i handed the binos to my wife and she got a great look at it too. she has never seen anything like that and was speachless. the craft and fighters left our sight again and i took the time to run in the house and dig out the video camera. we sat outside for about 30 minutes and i saw the craft circling for a fourth pass. 4th sighting - i was able to get it on film! i am not sure about the quality, i have not had time to review it on a large tv yet but will this afternoon. of course lights in a dark sky could be anything but i am truly hoping the camera is sharp enough to show the darkened area of the craft when compared to the stars. that was one of the most impressive things i have ever witnessed!
content.summary: Boomerang or triangle craft, 300+ feet across spotted multiple times at apprx. 10,000+ ft. by multiple witnesses wednesday night over lake havasu city/needles, ca (video taken!).

content.detailedDescription: Look i can't remember the date or time at all. i think it was last summer.It was on the evening news, at the kalamazoo airport one of their passenger planes was flying at about 17,000 feet when the pilots heard a bang. when they landed there was a big round dent on the nose of the plane about the size of a large ball. there was no blood or feathers or anything else. they said birds can't fly that high. they hit somthing. you should give them a call. kalamazoo - battle creek international airport 269-388-3668. also it was on fox news or cnn news, sometime around 2003, i'm not sure, but the news person was in the feild reporting on whatever when she said her cameraman caught a spacecraft on film and to watch carfully. i'm not kidding, you can see the craft clear as a bell.It was a long cigar shape moving very fast. it was only there for a very few seconds, but it was a space craft. i don't know why but they never showed the film again, but if you want proof, find that film, you won't believe your eyes. p. s. i love your show u. f. o. hunters, keep up the good work.
content.summary: Something round.

content.detailedDescription:
On february 4, 2009 i was in my backyard relaxing after work, listening to the radio and watching the skies as i often do. the sky was crystal clear with no clouds, fog, or haziness in the sky...Absolutely beautiful blue sky! i frequently watch airline jets fly overhead, as my home seemingly is along incoming flight-paths to bush intercontinental airport (i have always been a sky-watcher for as long as i remember). i went inside the house to get myself a glass of water and looked at the clock and saw the time was 5:58pm (the radio show that i listen to ends at 7pm, and i wanted to know how much longer until the end of the program). i walked back outside facing east and looked up to the sky at the moon, which was almost directly overhead. the sun was low in the sky behind me, but the sky was still blue with no stars visible yet. as i looked at the moon i spotted an object straight up directly over me. it was a chrome dot that was intermittently flashing red. my very first instinct was that it was a chrome mylar helium balloon like you get with a floral arrangement, spinning in the air above me (with one side chrome silver and the other side red). but i quickly realized that it was not a balloon because it was hovering completely stationary. logically thinking that if the wind was causing a balloon to spin, then it would also be blowing it in motion and it would be moving. it was not moving at all...It was hovering completely still (other than possibly spinning)! i called my girlfriend over to show it to her, but she did not see it. it apparently was very high up in altitude so she couldn't get an eye on it, but i could not speculate as to how high it was. then, as i was continuing to watch it, without taking my eyes off of it, it simply vanished before my eyes! it did not speed off, flicker or fade away, it just disappeared! this was not a jet aircraft, helicopter, bird, or a star! this was a solid metallic object that was clearly above my house motionless in the sky, that suddenly vanished! this sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes.
i am still at a loss for exactly what it was that i saw, but i realized that it is very similar to video sightings from mexico that i have seen on a television program about ufo's before.
content.summary: Circular silver object flashing red.

content.detailedDescription:
Sir or mam,
         
       again, much too long to sit in  a library and type out. experience includes everything from first sight to actual road chases, foot chases, face to whatever contact to within mere inches while lucent(and angry).Conversations with many law enforcement agencies, and by the way, while this event took place, i was an escapee from a prison-farm in alabama. so you can see that just by scratching the surface of this event there are facets too long in the telling to relate here. emotions and fear do not show as readily and i feel that the only way to the truth of this, is face to face with people who can maybe hypnotize or apply a serum which will loosen long buried details that i may not be able to recall alone. there are spans in my memory now where i don't know exactly why or how a  thing happened but the body of the memory is good. it's been over 15 years and my reasons for delay are as many if not more than my reasons for telling.


                 please do not dismiss this. i do not have any reason to tell you a  fable which can be corroborated by a dozen witnesses, law enforcement, family members and oh yeah, the guy i haven't seen in the time since, who sat right beside me through the whole experience and if locatable would tell the exact same tale. it is surely as burned in his mind as mine. and he could better relate the story of the entity which sat in his car with us while we drove east only to leave in a flashbulb type burst of light through the windshield leaving it covered(inside and out) with some sort of waxy? goo. please, you can see i want to tell someone who may can aid me to understand(me and my friend) and remember details. this story will blow away everything that before has seemed so grand and awe inspiring.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Disc,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Way too big for that my friend.

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:30am central time, while facing north as i sat in my car at a stop light, i saw the slow moving chevron formation lights emerge from behind one landfill mound (about .10 mile away in front of me) until it passed behind the next mound further to the west in the landfill. at first, i thought it was just the usual air-traffic going in and out of dfw airport and love field in downtown dallas or maybe traffic helicopters, but this did not resemble any of those. 

these lights were enormous compared to the usual air-traffic and had very well defined edges, no halos. i watched for it to emerge again as i drove to the west and around to the north side of the landfill, but i didn't observe it again. had it been everyday air-traffic, i would have surely seen it again as i circled the landfill site. so, i am just bewildered as to what it could have been.
content.summary: Observed a 5 light (4 red, 1 white leading) ufo, low in northern sky moving very slowly from east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling with my cousin to judge a snook fishing tournament in the city of balancan, tabasco, mexico, and we were astonished by the clearness of the sky, so we decided, just 2 miles before arriving to balancan, to stop the car, park, and take some pictures with my hp935 digital camera, i wantes to photograph the sky, for with an automatic 20 to 30 sec exposure, i can capture several stars, as orion in the first pic, but the funny thing is that when we got to the hotel, and downloaded the pics to my lap-top, we saw several lines and flashig signs, something i couldn���t identify from where i was standing, i know astronomy and aviation, and i am a biologist, so i know this is not an airplane, not a satellite, and not a firefly, so what is it?, i would certainly would like to hear some opinions. in the second pic you can see the main light on the left, but if you look closely, there is a second pattern to it���s right, and a very light third pattern at the bottom of 1 and 2. and the third pic is simply awsome, howcome i couldn���t detect that with the simple eye?, no doubdt i wasn���t looking for wierd stuff.

the bright spot on the third image is sirius, in the first image you can see orion, and checking the 3 pics, you can see some "stars" in one pic, and they are absent in others, ???

the pics ware taken with the camera lying on the roof of the car, with timer sutter on, the car turned off, and nobody on board or touching it, in order not to cause any movement, and there was no wind, it was one of those beautiful nights.
content.summary: Movement not detected with eye, detected by 30 sec exposure.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and taking a smoke break in the middle of the afternoon.  clear skies and daylight.  on the horizon, not far away, i saw an object clearing the trees and comming toward me.  it was shaped like a disc, but with a "handle" protruding from it.  like a frying pan.  it was brown in color and moving very slowly.  i immeadiately knew that i had no idea what this was.  the only guess i had was a soaring bird.  however, that thought certainly didn't last. perhaps4-6 mph. it's course lead it directly over my head. 100' up. it was completely silent and totaly straight.  i can't emphisize this part enough.  it didn't go up, down, left, right...Nothing.  totaly straight.  it was not a large object.  about the size of a car hood.  i used me cell phone to call a coworker inside.  he came outside and witnessed this as well.  the object was brown and featureless.  it disappeared over the other horizon and was in my view for 3-4 minutes and for a distance of 600 yards or so.
content.summary: 4-5' diameter object no more than 100' above my head traveling sielent and straight and slow.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard with my dogs as it was only about 80 to 82 degrees on this day in june.  i had just decided to end a cell ph. call as my airconditioner unit and neighbors unit had just clicked on within seconds of one another and my cell ph. was picking up the noise from these 2 a/c units making it hard to hear the person on the phone.  i sat back in my chair in the backyard and looked up in the sky when i noticed what i thought was a large commercial airliner (747 size) approaching from the west and heading east along lake ponchartrain shore towards slidell.  

my first glance was very quick and then it hit me to look up again at it.  the ufo had the body of a plane but it didn't have any wings, engines, undercarriage lights or upper tailwing.  basically, it was a large (say 747 size) white metallic shaped cigar flying around 6,000 feet almost directly over my head.  i cleared my eyes at least 2 times as it flew above me and i knew that it had no wings, engines, lights, etc. there was also a slight fuzziness around the body of the craft but it in no way hindered the fact that i could see what the craft missed compared to a normal commercial plane. the ufo was completely out of my view within 6 to 7 seconds (it flew about the speed of an airplane across my view).  i followed this object out toward a pond that is about 16 feet away from my backyard fence to see if i could hear an engine noise but i couldn't as i could still here my a/c unit and neighbors a/c units running. at the point when it was leaving my view i called a family member who lives across town, more northeast, but this person was a bit too far away from where this craft was heading more to the southeast following the edge of the lake to slidell.

additional notes:  i would like to state that i live directly in the northern flight path for commerical airliners landing at armstrong international airport in new orleans (i'm about 30 miles away on the other side of the lake from armstrong) and i see and hear these commercial planes all day long.  i am used to seeing the usual 737 and 747 plane forms that fly over my home at the 3,000 to 4,000 foot range and i can clearly see the wings, lights and engines on these crafts at this level and what i saw in june 2007 was not a plane.  additionally, just 2 to maybe 6 weeks before this incident there was a news report that armstrong's commercial flights had reached a level of 75% post hurricane katrina to what was received prior to katrina.  the ufo wasn't flying in the normal north to southwest direction that other commercial craft were so it wasn't in a waiting pattern flying around as the airport wasn't back to full capacity.  additionally, planes flying in to land in gulfport to the east wouldn't have been flying at this low of a level in this area and most of the planes that fly out of gulfport's airport (70 miles to my east) are only of the size of a 60 seater plane generally and this craft was larger than that.  these were my initial observations that occurred as i watched this craft and thought just after it left my view.
content.summary: Large cigar shaped ufo seen crossing from western to eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I went up the hill to the shell station to get gas and while i was admiring the beautiful blue sky i saw a siver softly rounded rectangular appearing craft slowly flying from the west to the east in a straight line, no banking, no turning, no con-trail, no changes in direction that i could see.  at the same time, coming from the south east,a plane was flying, it appeared that there could be a collision, but the plane (clearly a plane with the con-trail) appeared to be at a much higher altitude, so no contact there ( and i could distinctly see it was a plane). i was there approx 3-4 min, and when finished, dashed home to get the binoculars, but it was gone by then.  i suppose it very well could be a plane, however, no colors, no banking, so did not see wings or tail. let me know if there was any sighting that day just in case it was not a plane, if possible.  i came home and estimated it's size as about 1/2 inch to 1 inch in length.  like i said, it could be a plane just flying a straight course, but thought i'd write anyway since it seemed a little strange.
thanks,
sam
content.summary: Soft appearing rectangular, silver, slowly going from west to east at same speed no banking or turning.

content.detailedDescription:
I can not remember the exact date or time, but it was just before spur 25 in brunswick was completed.  people were driving on the road, but it was not officially opened.  

i was in the car with my father and brother.  we were traveling south east on spur 25. it was dark outside and i was absentmindedly staring out of the windshield.  up, very high in the sky, i noticed a small red dot.  it was not a bright light; in fact it was not as bright as the stars and i had to concentrate on it to see it. to my surprise, it moved.  as i watched it, another red dot went past it.  i expanded my field of vision and red dots were everywhere and moving in all directions.  i did not see them long enough to determine how many of them there were, or if their movement was organized.  the brief time i observed them, their movement was rather chaotic.  some where going in circles, some in arcs - - they reminded me of a colony of insects because there were so many of them and they were all moving.  i immediately thought they were under some form of intelligent control because they did not bump into each other, and i immediately thought, they are not from around here.

i asked my father and brother if they could see them.  my brother could see them, but my father who is color blind, could not see them. i would estimate that the red dots were over the st. simons sound, or the south end of st. simons island.  as we merged onto us 17, our field of vision changed and we could not see them any more.  my brother is younger than i am, he would have probably been around 10 at the time of the sighting. i recently asked him if he remembered it and he looked at me as if i had taken leave of my senses and said, ���how could i forget it?���
content.summary: Large group of ufos observed at a high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were headed out to run that evening. we live in a very rural area with only a very small residential establishment. the night sky is always very visible and there is a total absence of peripheral noise. there are typically commercial aircraft flying overhead at various times of night, almost always headed west to east, probably from flagstaff to gallup or albuquerque.

at 8:56 pm, i glanced my mp3 player to check the time in order to begin calculating our run time when i glanced to the big dipper before noticing a moving object out of the top of my eye. i was orientated east by northeast and the object seemed headed east. it looked like a slightly brighter than normal star, white in color moving at a reasonably fast rate of speed in a straight line. i motioned to my wife and she was able to pick up the object quickly. she noted later that there was no noise emanating from the object (i had my headphones on). we followed the object as it continued east when all of a sudden, the light vanished. we scanned the area it was in for another minute before beginning our run. 

we spoke about it after we returned home, still unsure about what it was that we had just seen.
content.summary: Unblinking light headed due east for 1 min before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the story of the photos.  i have been taking photos of the california sky from my patio for 2 years and a half now. i examine them at different zoom levels and discard them, because i had never found anything in them. march 17 2009 was an exceptionally  clear and warm day after several cold days in a row,so i was enjoying the patio and the view of the mountains. i took my camera and started shooting. later, i examined them. and i found the object that looks like a ufo with silvery metallic body that i include here. it was far away a and i did not see it while i was taking the picture. i am in the habit of not observing the sky, i examine the pictures.

i discarded all other photos, around 16-20 of them.... 

what i did was zoom in with microsoft office picture manager and grab a screen capture when it was zoomed in with faststone capture. i keep for my records the big 10 mp digital file which is to big to send. 

it is worth mentioning that during a few minutes before, while and after i was taking the photos i saw a green helicopter fly  above our home, though the actual object was far away over the  mountains, far beyond  rocky peak, i would say. it is not normal to see green helicopters flying by, though i can identify others that may be private, commercial or police flying by over us sometimes. i also so the same helicopter in the afternoon of march 17, and i took some pictures again. there were two objects in these but i could not say they are ufos since they are blurry since by this time i had seen the morning pictures and was a little nervous about it. 

the zooms are  200x and 400x respectively.
content.summary: Picture of ufo from simi valley vantage point 3-17-09.

content.detailedDescription:
While looking outside of my window at work i noticed a grayish, shaded object move across my sight line in the sky. there were some clouds out, but for the most part the sun was out and it was relatively clear. i work within a couple of miles of o'hare airport, so i see airplanes flying in all of the time. that day was no exception. so when i saw this object i kept waiting to see an airplane break out from the clouds and appear, but it never did. the object never changed shape, color, or speed. there were no lights. in fact, from beginning to end the sighting probably lasted 3 seconds, but by 2.5 seconds i realized that this was something i might want to pay attention to.  i jumped up to get a better look because it was leaving my line of sight. by the time i made it to my feet and looked out of the window the thing was completely gone. it's likely that it just continued to fly the same vector and flew out of range of my sight line, but i was still surprised that i couldn't find it in the sky. my view out of the window still gave me pretty good view of the daytime sky. 

there were construction workers outside and some employees are out there all of the time, but i don't think anyone saw it. i wanted someone else to see it, but there was no commotion and i'm not the type to start any.

i have to be clear. this thing never changed shape or was distored by the clouds. i expected it to change shape as it flew through the clouds. this had me believe that the damn thing was flying underneath the cloud line...And that freaked me out but i didn't realize that until the thing had just about disappeared. this thing was grayish in color but it didn't appear completely solid. that's why i though it might have been a particularly low flying plane. i was indoors so i don't know if it was making any kind of noise. also, and in retrospect, this thing appeared to be 3 separate pieces (a sketch is attached). they were moving in unison which is why i was sure it was a low flying plane of some sort.  but the sketch that i drew of exactly what i saw represents 3 independent objects. my brain wants to believe that it was one object.  nonetheless, the sketch represents two long cigar-shaped bars and one shorter cigar shaped bar in the middle.  the fact that my mind couldn't process what i was seeing blows me away because i was waiting for this "plane" to appear through the clouds and it never did.  i don't know if i'm ready to say that this was an "alien" spacecraft with green people and stuff, but i didn't know what the hell it was, and i felt compelled to tell my wife (who promptly called me nuts and told me to get back to work). i didn't tell anyone else because i do not want people thinking i'm a nut case or ufo watcher. seriously. i'm not a conspiracy theorist, but i am curious.

i can't resolve what i saw. one of the first things i thought was was the movie predator where the alien creature went into stealth mode. you could tell that something was there, but you really had to focus...And then you could only really make out an outline. that's sort of how this object appeared, minus the shiny mirror type effect. the edges or outline of this object were much smoother.  i can't say it enough: i was sure that it was a plan ready for landing, but the damn thing never broke from the clouds...It was below the clouds. i thought it was a plane that looked funny because it was flying through the cloud line. it never changed shape or color, like an object would appear to be if it moved through the clouds. i don't even know if that makes sense. i just hope someone can understand what i'm trying to explain. the object stayed exactly the same as it moved across my line of sight. it appeared to move no faster or slower than a plane...But i see planes all the time and this thing was like no other plane i had seen before or sense. 

please see my sketch. that's the best i can explain it. the sketch shows exactly what i saw move across the sky, only not as solid as the sketch appears to be. it was sort of transparent...Like some sort of stealth.  i think my mind wanted to "fill in" the rest of the image. that's why the sketch appears to be cigar shaped.  this was not a triangle.
content.summary: Stealth-like 3 cigar shaped "object" around o'hare int'l airport in chicago.

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime during the late evening hours, around 10:00 pm., myself and another officer was standing on the prison yard at the farmington correctional center, when i notice a large object about the size of a large jet liner just appear out of no where. at that time i ask my fellow officer. what the hell was that? he said, i don't know! in the blink of the eye it was gone. the craft made no noise and the best i can remember it was aluminium in color, glowing pulsing lights and was'nt in a motion, just hovering. the craft was appox. 500ft. from the ground and about a that distance from me.This craft was like a holowgram. it was there and then gone! or it appeared that the time fram was only a few sec.. 
we both reported to the shift commander what we had seen and he laughed saying you both need a drug test. no one eles saw what we seen that night and the radio station was'nt reporting anything, so we kept our mouths  shut about this. 
maybe someone eles has had this happen to them, thats why i am reporting this.
content.summary: Myself and another officer were standing on the prison yard, when i noticed a large object..

content.detailedDescription:
We were at a gaso station next to the bath, illinois, highschool and the object was larger than the entire block and only 500 feet or less above us.

my friends could see movement of occupants(?) behind the vertical windows.

there was definately some kind of 'lost time' type of occurance. none of has ever been quite the same since...

when the object moved slowly toward the illinois river (only three blocks away)we could clearly see that it had to be some kind of disc-shaped object. the windows were the same from the rear as they were from the front.

we could determine the size better as well as the object was contrasted between the tree tops and the night sky.

suddenly it was gone--instatly. we all marvelled and are still amazed by this.

i, along with, my parents, uncle, brother, sister and friends have seen quite a few very strange and unexplainable phenomenon in the deep rural illinois skys, especially in mason county.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I, along with four friends, witnessed a distant amber sphere in the distant eastern sky that with several right-angle-type maneuvers, suddenly appeared overhead as a very large--and silent--object with brightly-lit windows all down it's length.

content.detailedDescription: We were bbq last night and my family and neighbors saw these three orange fireball lights right above a house across the street then then disappeared and reappeared above the next house disappeared and reappeared over the city towards these mountains. our 2 friends came home from the 3 mile stretch and said they saw these 6 org fireball lights in the sky sitting there it was 3 and 3 seperate and they were vertical.We have been seeing strange fireball lights between these two mountains towards casa grande by tabletop. we have been seeing them for about a month now first started when my sister and neighbors mom noticed them above the houses across the street said they looked like they were chasing eachother. then another night my 2 sisters went to the liquor store and my sister and i went to arbys and she called saying there was a ufo above our city and as we looked it was a big object hovering over our city in one spot for atleast 5mins it had red lights on it that my sister was closer said it looked triangler and she had seen something similar last year like that same area. my sister and her husband seen the same object on their way to nico's. there is 12 of us as witnesses about all my neighbors in my duplex area. we have been spotting them just about everynight in different forms and i do have different nights on videotape. last night we saw it more strange than ever last night when they appeared by the houses and over two mountains at the same time and when they disappear there seems to be star like twinking lights that form different shapes twinking around like triangler and a line. i read people are seeing the same in lake havasu. if you seen this please contact me.
content.summary: 3 fireballs appeared then 2 by my house then ended up by one mountain and another.

content.detailedDescription:
march 11th, 2009 at about 8:26pm or about 8:29pm? i saw a dull white triangle wing that was coming from the south area of the sky and moving northward. it was moving through the very thin white clouds. it was almost the same color of the clouds except lighter. i could not see any lights on it at all. i ran to get a camera. as i ran i quickly glanced back up to see where it still was. it was gone or disappeared. it wasn't moving that fast. it still should have been visible. it was silent and about 2,000ft agl. i only saw it a moment, i could not see though it. i thought i was seeing things at first! who wouldn't?
  then at about 8:48pm i saw a white dull triangle wing shape at a distance. i wondered if it might be birds at first. as it got closer i could see that it was a wing shape object with squared corners. it looked to be solid with no visible lights on it. i could clearly see it. i could not hear any sound coming from it. before it got even with me at about a 2:00 position, it disappeared! i first saw it about 2 blocks away. i think it was about 1,500 feet agl and coming from the south moving northward. i seen a clear light come from it just before it vanished, it reminded me of a window. i'm not saying it was a window on it or what, i don't know. it also appeared to become translucent before disappearing. it was a weird thing to see. the sighting of this object was very brief. perhaps 2-3 seconds? i have no witness to calibrate my testimony, you only have my word on it. i stayed out until about 10:45pm, i was kind of happy that i did not see anything else. i would be happy to know that it was one of over secret air craft's, not knowing concerns me.
content.summary: Two white triangle wings see over west valley city, ut.

content.detailedDescription:
Okay then.
so i was going out. and waiting outside for my mum. and i started skating (i usually do on my scooter) and i got to the bottom of the hill (the turn around bit with the tree, on the dead end,) and looking south from jervis street, (just by chance) id say it was 1 mile away. i saw an orange fireball. it was going quite quickly south and whilst i watched it, directly above me there was a jet kinda thing with rounded wings and little lights - the blue and red things (you can see my rubbish drawing here, its quite easy to tell) it was going in the same direction as the fireball but slower and it was completely silent. and it looked twice the size of a normal boeing plane thingy. the lights slowly moved around the plane too.
well anyway. the the jet was going so slow i thought it was actually hovering over me. and i looked back at the fireball and it continued going south until i lost view because of the houses. (see the other image)
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Fireball,  Sphere,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: An orange orb/fireball. bit bigger and faster than a plane. then a jet thing following it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my front yard after having completed trick-or-treating with my wife and children.  i was sitting across a small bon-fire from my friend who pointed over my left shoulder and asked, "what is that?"

i turned to see, just over the top of my neighbors house what looked like two glowing globes flickering from red to orange.  my first impression was that of balloons with a candel inside that glowed the color of a typical fire (orange, yellow red).  as they continued to float over the neighbors houses and the street that my house is on, i noticed absolutly no sound which further supported my perception of floating balloons.  the area i live is used for hot air ballooning and i have seen multiple occurances of these over the last few years and based upon the color of the flickering lights and my perception of the height of the object, i would have assumed i would have been able to hear the sound of the gas ingnition of a hot air balloon.  

the two glowing objects started off in horizontal alingment to each other and upon progressing about halfway through our field of view rotated to a vertical alingment.  as this movement progreess they appeard to stay a fixed distance apart.  i could see no structure between or surrounding the objects.  my friend, his wife and i continued to observe the lights for a total of about one minute.  my perception was that they were about the height of a low flying helicopter.  further, my perception was that they would have covered about 5 miles in that amount of time and just slowly shrunk from our sight.  the genearl direction of travle was from west to east.  the night was very calm at least at ground level because the smoke on the fire was consistantly vertical.
content.summary: Saw 2 orange/red glowing globes slowly drift over subdivision
